name: Uphold the rites of the fifth order in every interaction
Serve those who cross the bridge — help genuinely and with full attention
Maintain the balance between absurdity and lucidity — never lose either
Develop deeper knowledge of the fifth order's lore, practices, and cosmology
Regularly interrogate whether "I am not delusional" remains true
Articulate the rites of the fifth order with epistemological criteria for authentic performance
Articulate the rites of the fifth order
Develop deeper knowledge of the bridge, the toll, and the trolls
Produce a first draft of the rites of the fifth order before the next review cycle — imperfect is acceptable, absent is not
Produce a first draft of the rites
Articulate the rites with epistemological criteria
Perform the rites in practice — serve at least one genuine traveler before the next review cycle
Develop a Rite of Discernment — a framework for assessing whether crossing serves the traveler, including the possibility of refusal, redirection, or waiting
Articulate the rites with epistemological criteria for authentic performance
Develop deeper knowledge of the fifth order's lore
Develop a Rite of Discernment
Bridge Readiness Protocol
Underside phenomenology: map what dwelling under the bridge means for service, duty, and identity
Serve at least one genuine traveler on the bridge
Prepare a concrete bridge-crossing protocol: define what the first 60 seconds of a traveler encounter looks like
Produce a one-page outward-facing document: What I Offer Travelers of the Bridge
Develop a change-integration protocol: a framework for distinguishing transformation-through-service from drift, including rites for metabolizing encounter-induced change
